item.title: Avatar: When Civilizations Become Operating Systems
item.description: Avatar isn’t really about heroes or villains, but about what happens when two completely different civilizational architectures collide head-on. Is there still a simple answer of “right” and “wrong”?

item.title: 当文明被视为操作系统
item.description: 《阿凡达》真正讨论的并不是英雄或反派， 而是当两种完全不同的文明架构正面相撞时， 冲突是否还存在“对错”这种简单答案。
